query: Gravel and Granite gravel race Tenterfield

videos.title: The Tenterfield Gravel n Granite 2023 Through Our Eyes
videos.description:
The 2023 Gravel n Granite ride in Tenterfield. The second running of this event starts in the Showgrounds, and heads out of town over Mt Mackenzie, to then do a big loop on some nice quiet country bitumen, and gravel roads.

Thank you to all involved in making this event possible!

Check out Gravel n Granite on Facebook here - https://www.facebook.com/GravelnGranite

videos.title: GRAVEL AND GRANITE CYCLING EVENT - TENTERFIELD 2023
videos.description: This years 2023 Edition 2 of Gravel n Granite in beautiful Tenterfield. March 4, 2023. What a smashing day.
videos.transcript:

videos.title: Gravel n Granite - 2025
videos.description: Set in the stunning region of Tenterfield, the 2025 events was a journey through rugged and spectacular landscapes, while testing riders' endurance, skill and spirit!
videos.transcript:
[Music]
The gravel and granite is really a tough
gravel riding event. We've sent these
riders off onto trails that range from,
you know, gravel roads to natural gravel
fire trail surfaces and I guess that's
the essence of the gravel and granite.
It's a tough adventure type ride.
Ladies and gentlemen, your attention
please. In three, two, one, roll away.
So, the different courses this year, we
have the Rain Rumble 91 km, the
Wellington Rocks course, 66 km, and the
Basket Swamp Bash, which is our short
course adaptive ride, 38 km back into
town. The course today was very
challenging. Bit carnage, few crashes,
lots of cramps, lots of injuries. That
all makes for good riding. There's
nothing wrong with the challenge.
So, we done the Curry's Dash today. It
was 11Ks. It's a good little course for
kids.
It was a really good family friendly.
It was very fun. Very bumpy.
It's really nice to actually do a ride
as a family together. So, that was
pretty special that we could do that
today. Attention field.
It was an awesome weekend. Really
wellrun event. Very inclusive. Nothing's
a drama, mate. I love it. I still got a
grin on me face just thinking about it.
It's been one of the best years so far
and it will only get bigger and better.
I think
it truly is a a magical place to to
ride.

videos.title: Gravel n Granite, Tenterfield // I Think I Smiled the Whole Way
videos.description:
#gravelevent
What a way to see the countryside! An awesome event at Tenterfield with almost 600 people enjoying the Granite Belt and a fun but tough day in the saddle.

☕️ Buy us a Coffee https://www.buymeacoffee.com/trifit

// WATCH THESE NEXT 

⭐️ Tim’s Gravel n Granite Race https://geni.us/969t8Y
⭐️ Training in Paradise https://geni.us/dnXq23

// OUR MERCH //

👕 https://geni.us/moYP3cD

//  FOLLOW US ON …
💥 SUBSCRIBE ON YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/c/trifitwithtimandamanda
💥 INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/trifit.tim.amanda
💥 WEBSITE: https://trifitinavan.com
💥 FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/TriFitwithTimandAmanda/
💥 STRAVA - Tim https://www.strava.com/athletes/15634989
💥 STRAVA - Amanda https://www.strava.com/athletes/1330551

// SOME OF OUR FAVES: 

🎧 where we get music for our videos: https://www.epidemicsound.com/referral/d05zva/
👀 get more views on YouTube: https://www.tubebuddy.com/TriFit

// ABOUT US

We’re Tim and Amanda! We make videos about Triathlon. We’re a couple of age-groupers who love triathlon - the sport, the training, the races, the community.
Join us as we travel the east coast of Australia, training and racing. We’re living proof that anyone can compete in triathlons. You just need to give it a shot.

Cheers,
Amanda & Tim
